sentences.en: An electric motor and gear train is used to actuate the valve.
sentences.cn: 需要电机和齿轮传动机构来驱动阀门.

sentences.en: Coil power is the amount of power in watts needed to actuate the relay.
sentences.cn: 线圈功率是指触动继电器所需的功率量,单位为瓦.

sentences.en: Conclusion: This method was convenient, sensitive actuate, and suitable for the quality control.
sentences.cn: 结论本法简便、准确 、 灵敏, 可用于该制剂的质量控制.

sentences.en: Conclusion: This method was convenient, sensitive and actuate, and suitable for the quality control.
sentences.cn: 结论: 本方法简便 、 准确、专属, 可用于本品的含量测定及质量控制.

sentences.en: DEPRESS AND HOLD THE BRAKE PEDAL, WITH THE DRB , ACTUATE THE LEFT REAR HYDRAULIC.
sentences.cn: 蹋下并保持刹车踏板,用DRB引动左后液压.

sentences.en: Electric Actuator - An electromechanical device used to actuate ( open, close, or modulate ) a valve.
sentences.cn: 电动执行器 - 用来驱动 ( 开启, 关闭, 或调节 ) 阀门的电气机械装置.

sentences.en: Electromyogram ( EMG ) is employed to help determine the control signal used to actuate the muscle cylinders.
sentences.cn: 采用了肌电图 ( EMG ) 来帮助确定用于促动肌肉圆柱的控制信号.

sentences.en: Force needed to add to the executer unit to actuate switch contact.
sentences.cn: 使开关触点回复到正常位置,所必需减少施加于操动器上的力.

sentences.en: He was actuated by violent jealousy.
sentences.cn: 强烈的忌妒心驱使着他。

sentences.en: He was void of any of these feelings which actuate men to do good.
sentences.cn: 他缺乏任何促使人们行善的那种情绪.

sentences.en: More power is needed to actuate a relay than to maintain a given state.
sentences.cn: 需要更大的功率才能够触动继电器并维持给定的状态.

sentences.en: Piezoelectric materials have many superiority on precision actuate.
sentences.cn: 通过比较和分析,压电材料在实现精密驱动上具有相当大的优势.二.

sentences.en: PULL SHIFT LEVER TO LEFT SEVERAL TIMES TO ACTUATE DOWNSHIFT SWITCH.
sentences.cn: 把换挡叉杆向左拉动三次激活降挡开关.

sentences.en: Semiconductor switches actuate reed relays for signal circuits or power relays for other functions.
sentences.cn: 在信号电路中,以半导体开关驱动舌簧继电器;在其它程序动作电路中,以半导体开关驱动功率继电器.

sentences.en: The flow of current actuates the signal.
The same drive systems actuate robots, transfer lines , flight simulators, graphic plotters etc.
sentences.cn: 同一类驱动系统驱动自动机械 、 传送带 、 飞行模拟器 、 图形标绘器等.

sentences.en: WITH THE DRB, ACTUATE DOOR UNLOCK AND OBSERVE THE TEST LIGHT.
sentences.cn: 用DRB触发门开锁继电器并观察测试灯.

words.tran_cn: [自] 执行机构；激励者；促动器
驱动；激励（actuate的过去分词形式）；使运转
开动（机器等）；促使，驱使；激励（人等）

trans.tran_en: to make a piece of machinery start to operate

trans.tran_cn: 使动作，开动，（通常用于被动语态）驱使，激励
trans.tran_en: to make a piece of machinery start to operate
